Container.Name: Authelia
Container.Overview: Authelia is an open-source authentication and authorization server providing 2-factor authentication and single sign-on (SSO) for your applications via a web portal. It acts as a companion of reverse proxies like nginx, Traefik or HAProxy to let them know whether queries should pass through. Instructions: https://github.com/ibracorp/authelia. Our docs can be found at https://docs.ibracorp.io
